page.title: 07Elton Brownies
page.content: To join the Brownies in Elton you make a promise to help others every day and keep the Brownie law.The uniform is a brown plain dress,a yellow tie,brown belt,brown bobble hat.We meet at Elton school hall on Wednesdays at 6.00 and finish at 7.30.There are four groups, with six girls in each.I'm a leader or sixer of a group called Pixies.We have a badge book we can work at to gain badges.Two ladies called Brown Owl and Tawny Owl look after the groups.One of the ladies comes from Elton,the other from Water Newton.During the evening we may go for a walk,play games,work for a badge or go on a treasure-hunt. We always finish with a prayer.The Brownies pay 25p.for the evening.Girls join following their seventh birthday and leave at eleven to join the Guides .Boys join a Cub pack when they are 8 but travel to Oundle or Castor.
